title: Interactive Online Language Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and foundational knowledge of language education
context.additional_context: Intensive design training program to enhance language education competencies for in-service practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more interaction strategies applicable to online language education
Learners can propose content organization plans optimized for mobile environments
Learners can create a design document for formative assessment-centered interactive activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
